author: USA TODAY, Morgan Hines, USA TODAY
title: Bill Cosby won't get out of prison early, despite coronavirus fears; state trying to 'execute' him, rep says
description: Bill Cosby won't be leaving incarceration in Pennsylvania any time soon, despite concerns that he could be susceptible to coronavirus while in prison.
content:
Bill Cosby arrives for a sentencing hearing following his sexual assault conviction in Norristown Pa., in September 2018.
 (Photo: Matt Rourke/ AP)
